name: Affiliate WooCommerce Coupons Integration
author: Tips and Tricks HQ

sections.description:
This addon allows you to track affiliate commission via WooCommerce discount codes or coupons.

The WP Affiliate Platform is a WordPress plugin that allows you to create a complete affiliate system within your WordPress website (without requiring any third party services).

If you are using WooCommerce plugin and you want to integrate it’s discount coupons with the WP Affiliate plugin then use this addon plugin.

You can find detailed usage instructions for this addon here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “wp-affiliate-woocommerce-coupons.zip” file via the WordPress’s plugin uploader interface (Plugins -> Add New -> Upload)
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Woo Coupons interface from the WP Affiliate plugin’s admin dashboard menu.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Removed usage of a deprecated function (of woocommerce).

1.3

  • Added a new shortcode to show the coupon associated to the affiliate.
    [wpap_woo_show_coupon_code]

1.2

  • Made the coupon code comparison case insensitive.

1.1

  • First commit to WordPress repo
